headline: How Strong AI‑Driven Quarter and Upbeat Guidance At Autodesk (ADSK) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Autodesk recently reported a past quarter with revenue rising 18% year on year and earnings guidance coming in ahead of analyst expectations, supported by strong EBITDA performance. Management underscored Autodesk’s push into AI-driven design and automation, highlighting new human‑machine workflows and evolving business models as key to its competitive edge across architecture, engineering, construction, and manufacturing. Now we’ll examine how Autodesk’s stronger‑than‑expected quarter,...
